revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==English== ===Alternative forms=== * {{q|from [[Wade–Giles]]}} {{l|en|Hsieh}} * {{l|en|Sieh}} ===Etymology=== From the [[Hanyu Pinyin]] romanization of the {{bor|en|cmn|-}} pronunciation for {{zh-l|謝|Xiè}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Xies}} # {{surname|en|from=Chinese}}. ===Statistics=== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Xie'' is the 3662<sup>nd</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 9716 individuals. ''Xie'' is most common among Asian/Pacific Islander (98.19%) individuals.
